title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 369 - Filing Application For Performance Of Duty Disability Retirement Under Sections 63-a, 507-b And 607-a Of The Retirement And Social Security Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 369 - Filing Application For Performance Of Duty Disability Retirement Under Sections 63-a, 507-b And 607-a Of The Retirement And Social Security Law

State Regulations
§ 369.1 - Background
§ 369.2 - Filing of application for performance of duty disability retirement under sections 63-a, 507-b and 607-a of the retirement and social security law

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 369

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 19, 63, 63-A, 507-b, 519, 607-a, 613

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
